string-array.name: Quiz1
string-array.item: Which of the following options does not belong to the layouts of Android Studio?

string-array.name: Quiz2
string-array.item: Which of the following options is not one part of the activity lifecycle?

string-array.name: Quiz3
string-array.item: Which of the following options can be used with Intent to pass values between two Activities?

string-array.name: Quiz4
string-array.item: Which of the following options allows components to request functionally from other components of the Android system?

string-array.name: Quiz5
string-array.item: Which of the following options can make the Activity jump to another Activity and get the parameters passed back from the new Activity?
